subject: Baseball
Friendship
Doping (Sports)
Witnesses
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: Andy Pettitte, who was for years a friend and teammate of Roger Clemens, is a key witness in Clemens’s perjury trial, which begins this week.
snippet: Andy Pettitte, who was for years a friend and teammate of Roger Clemens, is a key witness in Clemens’s perjury trial, which begins this week.
